list_definition.definition: a small narrow opening, especially one to receive coins

list_definition.definition: a (usually regular) position (in eg the schedule of television/radio programmes)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He slotted the last piece of the puzzle into place
I managed to slot in my tea-break between two jobs.
